article.title: Status and history for aka_fante
article.para: There are occurrences of U+0027 ' APOSTROPHE (apparently all after a single n), but it”s unclear what they should be replaced with.

history.history-entry: changed from ISO 639-3: ak, BCP 47: ak to ISO 639-3: fat, BCP 47: fat.
replaced all the occurrences of U+0251 ɑ LATIN SMALL LETTER ALPHA by U+0061 a LATIN SMALL LETTER A. Thanks to Denis Moyogo Jacquerye for pointing out this mistake.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
